message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"cinema; movie theater","sentence":"这儿是电影院。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style painting of a small group of people entering a modern movie theater building, with a bright sign reading '电影院' above the entrance. The theater is surrounded by a subtly overgrown environment with hints of urban decay, like cracked pavement and distant, misty, abandoned buildings, yet the theater remains well-lit and inviting, creating a hopeful atmosphere.","sentence_translation":"Here is the cinema."}
